extendedInfo.description: ***Askeroid 3.0 â new name, new look. 1x1 button in addition to classic 4x1 bar. HTC Sense and Google visual styles***Askeroid is a mobile desktop search widget. We offer 300 different Web search engines, and the number keeps growing! Add Askeroid button or bar widget to your home screen, choose one or more buttons for your most used search engines, and enjoy the full power of vertical search. We search all vertical areas you may ever need: - knowledge bases (Wikipedia, IMdB, HowStuffWorks, WolframAlpha)- dictionaries (Dictionary.com, Thesaurus.com, Merriam-Webster, Canoonet)- translation services (Google Translate, Lingvo, Multitran, Zargan, Dict.cc) - files (4Shared, 2shared, HotFileSearch)- torrents (The PirateBay, Demonoid.me, ISOHunt, KickAss, Toorgle, ÂµTorrent, UTorrent)- music (AllMusic, Pandora, WhoSampled, Jamendo, Last.fm, Spotiseek)- videos (YouTube, Vevo, Blip.tv, Criticker)- images (DeviantArt, Flickr, Creative Commons, Google Images)- social networks (Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, Hyves)- questions and answers (Answers.com, Quora, ChaCha)- mobile apps (Android Market, Amazon, 1Mobile, AppBrain)- classifieds (Craiglist, KiJiJi)- e-commerce (Amazon, Pricegrabber, BestBuy, uSwitch, Dealspl.us, Bondfaro, Mercado, Allegro) - events (TicketMaster, GrooveTickets)- maps (Google Maps, Yandex Maps)- health (WebMD, PubMed.gov)- news (CNet, Bay News 9, Engadget, Reddit)  - urban culture (Urban Dictionary, Snopes)There are many other websites and verticals you can search with Askeroid. Do you know that there is a search engine for all things about peanuts? Try The Peanut Roster. If you have no idea what search engine fits your need best, use a new focused no-spam search engine (Blekko, DevilFinder, DuckDuckGo, Mooter, Beaucoup, Copernic) or natural language question search (Ask.com, True Knowledge,). You might be surprised at how good they are! You can also use an old fashioned general purpose search engine (Google, Bing, Ask, Yahoo,) or try meta search across them all (Dogpile, Webcrawler, Hotbot). Several search engines can even make you some money (Swagbuck, MyPoints).If you live in a non-English speaking country, we have for you national search engines (Baidu, Yandex, Terra, Eniro, entireWeb). If the search engine you need is not listed or found inside Askeroid, use a feature "Not found" to send me a message. I quickly fulfill most (but not all) requests - please do not ask for warez or porn! You are free to use such search engines but not through Askeroid. INSTALLAskeroid will not appear on home screen automatically after installation â sorry, it is a Google security measure. Add it to Home screen manually. If by the time you install Askeroid you forget these instructions, launch the Askeroid app in your applications folder and you will get on-screen instructions on what to do. To install a widget: 1. Select the screen where you want your widget to be. 2. Either press Menu and then Add to Home or long press on the empty space on the screen until an Add menu  appears.3. Press Widget.4. Select Askeroid 1x1 or Askeroid 4x1 widget type.Askeroid customization screen will pop out. Select the search engine(s) and visual style you like and press BACK arrow when done. MULTIPLE WIDGETSYou can add more than one Askeroid widget to the same screen or different screens. Each widget can have a different set of search engine icons. However, each widget must also be customized separately. USING WIDGET1. Press an icon of the search engine you want to use.2. Type on the on-screen keyboard. Your search string will appear in the search field above. 3. When done, press the search "Magnifying Glass" button on the right. Your search results will be in the browser window that will open. To cancel, press a BACK key once to close a keyboard and twice to close the search field. NEED HELP ? FOUND A BUG ?Write to Linda at busdev@sadko.mobi or visit our Facebook page

reviews.title: Took A While To Figure Out
reviews.comment: I usually do not use widgets, so it took a while for me to figure out how to make the 1 x 1 widget work, as I kept looking for some kind of confirmation button, once I had made my choices. Turns out I just needed to press the back button, and my chosen search engine would be in the spot I had selected for it. Clearer instructions and the ability for the user to add their own search engines would earn this application five stars.
reviews.author: Opalin Pickens

reviews.title: Doesnt work
reviews.comment: I have the Droid Bionic with the current operating system and the loading instructions do not work.  I do not have an \'Add to Home\' option and the menu button doesn\'t add widgets.  I have to add widgets through the application menu and askeroid is not listed in the widgets list.  Pleade help for a better review.
reviews.author: Sean Gilmartin

reviews.title: why won\'t it open?
reviews.comment: I have a Pantech tablet 4100 the app won\'t open. It only promt\'s me to put it on my desktopand it refuses to open
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: replace Google slow bar
reviews.comment: since android replaced the good Google Search bar with the incredibly slow crap bar, i removed them all from my home screens and replaced them app askeroid. I love this app.  could we get an update?

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Excellent concept and has every search engine you can imagine. Love that there isn\'t ads as well.   Thanks for your hard work!

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: Exactly what I was looking for.Effective, clean 1x1 widget. Thank you.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: My most used widget, does everything I want perfectly :) but one thing, higher resolution icons please! Also maybe a transparent theme? Still the best search widget tho!

reviews.comment: The most search engines available compared to any other app of its kind. 4x1 widget is kind of ugly though.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is just what I\'ve been looking for! My main search engines right on the homescreen for easy access. And it opens with my default browser! :D

reviews.title: A bit clunky
